title: Escape from New York OST (1981) John Carpenter
description:
Escape from New York (1981) John Carpenter

Music Composed and Performed by John Carpenter
in associaton with Alan Howarth

01 - Main Title (3:25)
02 - Up the Wall - Airforce #1 (2:29)
03 - Orientation (1:48)
04 - Engulfed Cathedral (Debussy) (3:33)
05 - Back to the Pod - The Crazies Come Out (3:00)
06 - Arrival at the Library (1:06)
07 - Everyone's Coming to New York (2:54)

08 - The Duke Arrives - The Barricade (3:35)
09 - Police State - Romero and the President (3:21)
10 - The President and the Train (2:55)
11 - The President is Gone (2:30)
12 - Chase Across the 69th Street Bridge (2:33)
13 - Over the Wall (3:43)


vinyl rip, MP3 Audio: 256 Kbps, 44,100 Hz, 16 Bit, Stereo.

Album cover: 

escape_from_ny_front_cover.jpg
escape_from_ny_back_cover.jpg



As much as I love the Precinct 13 score, this one is still my 
personal favorite. The 'expanded version' one on CD is nice, but
I prefer it without all the dialog. Here it is in all its glory!

The Duke of New York has finally made it to a better place. A-Number-1!!
In Memorium: Issac Hayes 1942-2008
